data.eml:eml: Three new cryptic species of Euglossa from Brazil (Hymenoptera, Apidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nemesio, Andre, Engel, Michael S. (2012): Three new cryptic species of Euglossa from Brazil (Hymenoptera, Apidae). ZooKeys 222: 47-68, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.222.3382, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.222.3382
